name: croner
description: Trigger functions and/or evaluate cron expressions in JavaScript. No dependencies. Most features. All environments.
author: Hexagon <github.com/hexagon>

scripts.build: npm update && npm run build:precleanup && npm run test:lint && npm run build:typings && npm run build:dist && npm run build:minify && npm run build:cleanup && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:dist
scripts.build:ci: npm run test:lint && npm run build:typings && npm run build:dist && npm run build:minify && npm run build:cleanup && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:dist
scripts.build:precleanup: (rm -rf types/* || del /Q types\*) && (rm -rf dist/* || del /Q dist\*)
scripts.build:minify: uglifyjs dist/croner.cjs --source-map -o dist/croner.min.js && uglifyjs dist/croner.cjs --source-map -o dist/croner.min.cjs && uglifyjs dist/croner.mjs --source-map -o dist/croner.min.mjs
scripts.build:cleanup: (rm dist/croner.mjs || del dist\croner.mjs) || (rm dist/croner.cjs || del dist\croner.cjs)
